name: Corpobots
description:
Get ready for an electrifying multiplayer showdown with Corpobots!  Build and customize your very own household appliance battle bot, choose your weapons, and showcase your brand in a constantly changing arena!  Rise to the top and become the Boss in an epic battle! GAME CONTROLS THE TEAM Contributors:
  • Joseph Ballantyne - Game Designer & Programmer
  • Zoe Pilgrim - Sound Designer & Programmer
  • Stevie Dong "Sir_Burnt" - 2D Artist 
  • Emma Martherus "Misty" - 3D Artist
  • Joseph Ryder - Level Designer & Project Manager

This game is being developed for our 2023 Capstone Project in the Honours Bachelor of Game Design Program at Sheridan College, Oakville, Ontario, Canada.
